reviewText: Great DVD set.  Looking forward to much learning.

This product does what it is ment to do which is teaching the katas. It does is job well...especially for someone who has a little background in karate.

The video is basically a direct copy from a video tape and it would have been nicer if the DVDs were divided to chapters for easy finding the kata you want to see.

But as I said before it does is job!
